summary: 280 Wallpapers in 1360 x 768 pixels from in-game
descriptionHtml:
Collection of screenshoot wallpapers from my in-game TESV Skyrim
1360 x 768 pixels
24 in image 280 jpg in .rar

[youtube]QOMB4sEoN3c[/youtube]

Just want to share all this scenery from my in-game screenshot. I never get enough of this beauty and all this everlasting modification that this community given to me, so by sharing this, is at least that i can do XD. There`s 200 images with ENB for RCRN and 80 with Sharpshooters extreme graphic ENB. Actually there is more but i pick only the best scenery for your liking.

Its for your desktop wallpaper, just create a folder in a suitable location. 
Extract the files to that folder. Then right click on your desktop, personalize click desktop background, select all  and voila thats it. Or simply select one or more image you want as your wallpaper, and click right choose \"Set as desktop background\".

If you want to put it in your game, you might check this mod:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25875] Simplified Skyrim Main Menu Wallpaper Replacers by insane0hflex aka svaalbard[/url]

Oh and there is mod i make, maybe you\'ll like it

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30666]Dual Wield New Animation[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30109]Running With Spells - New Animation[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33249]Hold Your Torch Higher[/url]

Cheers XD
author: robiehn
